Text: A fan film does not equal a "lost episode". Misrepresented garbage.

Thanks for this!  This is definitely more of a "lost episode" than a fan film.  The screenplay is written by Rod Sterling, and the cast includes Charlton Heston and Roddy McDowall.  It basically *is* a TZ episode though it was never shown as one.

For more information see http://theforbidden-zone.com/media/tzone.shtml
